title: 107_s3010
content: The notice highlights a high concentration of pension assets in employer securities. The Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 is amended to include a new subsection requiring a notice if an individual account plan has over 50% of assets in employer securities and real property. The subsection excludes assets held through pooled investment vehicles from being considered in determining the percentage of employer securities and real property in an individual account plan. This subsection applies to plans holding readily tradable employer securities and allowing participants to control their account assets. The subsection excludes certain employee stock ownership plans from certain provisions. Additionally, penalties under the Employee Retirement Income Security Act are amended. The Secretary may assess a civil penalty of up to $100 a day against a plan administrator for failure to provide notice to participants and beneficiaries. Each violation is considered a separate violation. These amendments apply to plan years starting after December 31, 2002. SEC. 2. TREATMENT OF QUALIFIED RETIREMENT PLANNING SERVICES. The Internal Revenue Code is amended to limit the exclusion amount for qualified retirement planning services to $1,500 per individual per year, with no exclusion if the taxpayer's modified adjusted gross income exceeds $100,000 ($200,000 for married individuals). The exclusion amount for qualified retirement planning services is limited to $1,500 per individual per year if the taxpayer's modified adjusted gross income exceeds $100,000 ($200,000 for married individuals). Cash reimbursements by an employer to an employee for such services are included, and no amount is included in the employee's gross income solely because they may choose between services and compensation. The amendment made by this section applies to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2002, and includes changes to various sections of the Internal Revenue Code related to qualified retirement planning services.
